comment: Don't be an idiot. Illegal aliens stay as far away from government offices and agents including voting stations as they can get. If we got rid of all illegal aliens the USA would lose billions in taxes & revenues while costing less in benefits they can't receive like SNAP, WIC, SSI, SSDI, Vocational Rehabilitation, Promise, etc.
amr:

If we got rid of all illegal aliens the USA would lose billions in taxes & revenues while costing less in benefits they can't receive like SNAP, WIC, SSI, SSDI, Vocational Rehabilitation, Promise, etc.
